widgets.html:
Usage notes

----------------

Ardour Configuration

- Minimum version: 6

- Open Sound Control must be enabled in Settings > Control Surface

- Port mode must be set to "Auto" in Settings > Control Surface > OSC > Protocol parameters

Open Stage Control Configuration

- Minimum version: 1.2.1

- send: 127.0.0.1:3819

- custom-module: ardour-plugins-module.js

widgets.label: ^angle-double-right Send to Ardour
widgets.script:
var f = 1 + 2 + 16 + 16384
console.log("aa")
if (get("display_meters")) f += 128

if (get("display_transport")) f += 64

var args = [
  "/set_surface",
  get("bank_size"),
  get("trip_type_bitsum"),
  f,
  0,
  0,
]

if (!get("ardour5")) args.push(0,0)

send.apply(null, args)

widgets.label: ^file-export Save in cache
^angle-left
^angle-right
